title: Cap Tracking Dashboard UI
description:
Implement Capital Tracking Dashboard with Usage Monitoring and Alerts

Create a comprehensive dashboard that tracks capital usage against defined limits, displaying remaining capacity and proactively alerting users when approaching or exceeding thresholds.

Requirements:
- Display current capital usage with visual progress indicators (e.g., progress bars, gauges)
- Show remaining capital capacity prominently with clear numerical and percentage values
- Calculate and display usage trends over time (daily, weekly, monthly views)
- Implement configurable warning thresholds (e.g., 75%, 90%, 100% of cap)
- Trigger visual alerts when usage approaches or exceeds defined limits
- Support multiple capital categories or pools if applicable
- Ensure real-time or near-real-time data updates
- Provide historical data visualization to track patterns
- Include filtering options by time period, category, or department
- Make dashboard responsive for desktop and mobile viewing

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Handle scenarios where cap limits are modified mid-period
- Display appropriate messaging when no cap is defined
- Account for negative adjustments or refunds to capital usage
- Handle concurrent updates to prevent race conditions

Success Criteria:
- Users can quickly identify current capital position at a glance
- Alerts are delivered before limits are reached to enable proactive action
- Dashboard loads within 2 seconds with up-to-date information
- All stakeholders have appropriate access based on permissions
